h3.a: We are Trying to Reach You!

div.div: Teachers are trying to reach out to families to find them to begin our distance learning plan--please click on the link to find out how to connect!

h3.a: New Alert--School Closure Extended For Remainder of the Year

div.div: Please read Superintendent Daryl Camp's most recent message to the community. Click on the link in the title for more information.

SLZUSD will serve meals at Arroyo High School, Hesperian Elementary and Hillside School (NEW LOCATION!) from 11 am – 1pm for students 18 and under, on a first-come first-serve basis. Click on the link in the title for more information!

h3.a: Interested in becoming a teacher in San Lorenzo USD?

div.div: San Lorenzo USD is accepting referrals for candidates for the Alder Teacher Residency Program.

h3.a: We are looking for Substitute Teachers

div.div: San Lorenzo Unified School District has partnered with ESS, a leading education staffing company that places talented substitute teachers and support staff.
San Lorenzo Unified School District welcomes new students and makes enrollment easy through AIR online enrollment. Read more on our website.
Location: San Lorenzo Adult School, Room 15
